faq-urs-ib4a4DV0.q: If Ursafar discards Silver to defend, is he still enraged?
faq-urs-ib4a4DV0.a: Yes. Primary Defense (or Defense/Skill) actions resolve their text, including Active Effects, even if they end up in the Discard Pile. (Note that if it later changes state, the Active Effect is canceled.)

faq-urs-znPgp2l0.q: Does Ursafar gain coins for removing a minion on his Primary Red?
faq-urs-znPgp2l0.a: No. Coins are only gained for defeating a Minion, not Removing one.

faq-urs-reTuR399.q: When Ursafar’s Alternate Blue is Active, can Heroes move next to him? Can they move away from him?
faq-urs-reTuR399.a: Yes. Enemy Heroes cannot move through spaces adjacent to Ursafar. As the reminder text on Tier II indicates, they can move into or out of an adjacent space, but not both.

faq-urs-Il223e44.q: Would Ursafar’s Ultimate allow him to move using his Silver?
faq-urs-Il223e44.a: No. The second effect on Angry Roar, +2 Movement, will only increase the Movement value of a card which already has a Movement Action.
